node.title: What happened to the perfect child?
node.description: More than 20 years ago, a Russian girl was adopted by a young American couple who eventually brought her back to Moscow after her parents say she tried to kill her baby brother.
node.content: ["More than 20 years ago, a Russian girl was adopted by a young American couple who eventually brought her back to Moscow after her parents say she tried to kill her baby brother. What happened to that little girl?\u00a0\u00a0And how did she end up back in the United States?", "In 1997, Crystal and Jesse were a young married couple eager to start a family. After years of trying to have a child on their own, they decided to take the adoption route. They came across a Russian adoption agency's website and saw a photo of a 9-year-old girl. \"She was a beautiful child,\" Crystal said. \"We thought ... this is an older child we can give a normal life.\" Excited for this next chapter, the couple began the adoption process. \u00a0"]
